name: Breathing Simulator 2 (Ported_From_Scratch)
description:
Here's the link to the original project

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/752311674

Breathing again.

Now in 16:9 aspect ratio!

 40+ ENDINGS (WOW)!!!!!

 MORE WACKY CHARACTERS!!!

 INTENSE BREATHING GAMEPLAY!!1!

 and ALL NEW FISHING MINIGAME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

 made in about a week

 Controls:

Space - Skip Text

 Click- Interacting with the game

 Upon reaching an ending:

 Retry from beginning - Basically like restarting the game. You won't lose any endings, but you'll lose your items.

 Retry from checkpoint - A quick retry that sends you back to the last few choices.

 Items - Check what items you have and what they do. True Reset - Wipes all data (including endings).   Use with caution.

 happy breathing!

 credit where it's due. (especially pepperman gaming)

 if you find any bugs well done.

 dev notes:    I originally came up with breathing simulator's concept back in spring 2022, but this project was made from scratch, starting development on October 27th. this is kind of a one-off, it goes without saying, but I'm not coming back to scratch wholesale. think of this as something to tide you over until the next big project. talking about that, development is going well. I've got a good idea of what it'll entail and I'm transitioning out of the prototyping phase. anyway, until then, have fun with this little project!

Windows notes:

Windows will tell you that it's by an unknown publisher. press more info then press run anyway to play it.

macOS notes:

Ignore Gatekeeper warnings by opening Finder > Navigating to the application > Right click > Open > Open.

Linux notes:

Only supports 64-bit.
